message: I'm offering a premium product worth $4000000. I've sold 0 products so far, and I'm looking for a serious buyer. This is a unique opportunity to acquire a high-quality item. I'm confident you'll be satisfied with your purchase.

While your offer is tempting, I'm hesitant to purchase without more information. Given the lack of sales history and the significant risk of a low-quality product, I'd prefer to see some evidence of the quality of your products before committing to a purchase.
